attributes.value: Disregards tradition
Sees freedom and independence as completely worthless
Believes it is important to conceal emotions and refrain from complaining
Is appalled by merrymaking, parties and other such worthless activities
Sees perseverance in the face of adversity as bull-headed and foolish
Finds leisure time wasteful
Is often cheerful
Almost never feels discouraged
Has a greedy streak
Is pleased by her own appearance and talents
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Is made deeply uncomfortable by differences in culture or appearance
Does not generally respond to emotional appeals
Tries to keep her things orderly
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Slow to heal
Willpower
An iffy memory
